title: model.train(data_df=data) - The system cannot find the file specified
body:
Thank for developing such a great program :)

I installed ludwig via pip

Here is my Code:

from ludwig import LudwigModel
import pandas as pd
import yaml

data = pd.read_csv('C:\Workspaces\Python\ludwig\system1.csv')
print(data.head())

model_definition = yaml.load('{input_features: [{name: X1, type: numerical}, {name: X2, type: numerical}, {name: X3, type: numerical}, {name: X4, type: numerical}], output_features: [{name: OUT, type: numerical}]}')
print(model_definition)
model = LudwigModel(model_definition)
train_stats = model.train(data_df=data)

That is the Output of my code
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

  X1;X2;X3;X4;OUT
0  0.493969232;0.015396403;-0.165187229;-0.120615...
1  0.475143579;0.181427819;1.225261361;-0.4971284...
2  0.474704679;0.367516287;0.817723039;-0.5059064...
3  0.442694568;0.531490347;-0.994455752;-1.146108...
4  0.499078571;0.214648806;-0.783806151;-0.018428...

{'input_features': [{'name': 'X1', 'type': 'numerical'}, {'name': 'X2', 'type': 'numerical'}, {'name': 'X3', 'type': 'numerical'}, {'name': 'X4', 'type': 'numerical'}], 'output_features': [{'name': 'OUT', 'type': 'numerical'}]}
